title: Implement service mesh observability platform
description: Build comprehensive service mesh monitoring that tracks inter-service communication, latency metrics, and failure patterns with distributed tracing capabilities
iWant: complete service mesh observability with distributed tracing and performance analytics
soThat: I can identify service bottlenecks within 2 minutes and maintain sub-100ms inter-service latency
acceptanceCriteria: Distributed tracing captures 100% of inter-service requests
Performance bottlenecks are identified within 2 minutes of occurrence
Service dependency mapping updates automatically in real-time
Latency analytics provide percentile breakdowns for all service calls
